Modifications.Value: If Ignacious would die, he instead regains some health for 30 seconds. If he attacks 5 times in this form, he revives instantly. Otherwise, he dies. |n|n|cffffcc00Level 1|r - Restores 1200 health and increases attack damage by 40.|n|cffffcc00Level 2|r - Restores 1500 health and increases attack damage by 60. |n|cffffcc00Level 3|r - Restores 1800 health and increases attack damage by 80.

If Ignacious would die, he instead regains 1200 health and stays alive for 30 seconds, increasing his attack damage by 40. If he attacks 5 times in this form, he revives instantly. Otherwise, he dies.

If Ignacious would die, he instead regains 1500 health and stays alive for 30 seconds, increasing his attack damage by 60. If he attacks 5 times in this form, he revives instantly. Otherwise, he dies.

If Ignacious would die, he instead regains 1800 health and stays alive for 30 seconds, increasing his attack damage by 80. If he attacks 5 times in this form, he revives instantly. Otherwise, he dies.
